title: Laura Coates, Pursuit: A Black Prosecutor's Fight for Fairness
description:
CNN senior legal analyst Laura Coates talks about her time as a federal prosecutor. She’s interviewed by author and Georgetown Law professor and Director of their Juvenile Justice Clinic and Initiative Kristin Henning.
